comment: The extension ` E ` of ` K ` is finite if and only if ` E ` is finite over ` F ` and ` F ` is finite over ` K ` . Corollary 1.3 of [Lang] , p. 225. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jul-2023.)
